text: Vice-Admiral Iqbal Fazl Quadir (Urdu:اقبال فضل قادر) , (died 19 October 2020) was a Pakistani three-star rank admiral in the Navy, diplomat and analyst. He was known for his participation in second war. He was the Ambassador to Iran between 1983 to 1985. Qadir died on 19 October 2020.Ghazi of 1965’s Operation Dwarka Vice Admiral retd Iqbal Fazal Qadir passes away ==References== ==Other websites== *Strong political will needed for success of CPEC *Indian Naval Doctrine *Myrter of Naval Crews in 1999 Category:Year of birth missing Category:2020 deaths Category:People from Islamabad Category:Pakistani military people Category:Ambassadors Category:Pakistani diplomats
title: Iqbal F. Qadir
